data_description.password: The Automation Code is required to access all panels using the Mode 2 protocol. It can be configured via the A-Link Plus or the Remote Programming Software (RPS). It needs to be set to a string that is at least 10 characters.
data_description.installer_code: The Installer Code is used to access the configuration interface. Typically, it is a 4 digit numeric pin.
data_description.user_code: The User Code is the code used to arm the panel. Typically, it is a 4 digit numeric pin.

data_description.code: The arming code is used to protect the arm/disarm operations locally within Home Assistant. It does not have to match any of the codes configured in the panel.
